alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Nobles (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 12:06AM CST until December 26 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Blowing snow and mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations less than a half inch, and possibly spotty ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph, most likely in south central South Dakota. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa, southwest Minnesota and central, east central, south central and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 3 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could quickly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
